title: Studi kasus perilaku inflasi indonesia periode krisis moneter Juli 1997-Juni 1998
abstract: This research was undertaken by the writer to evaluate the topic of Inflation of Indonesia, so that this research is a case study of Inflation in Indonesia for time period of January 1996 - June 1998 , expesially the period of monetary crisis from July 1997 June 1998 . This research uses secondary data consisting of data showing the change of money supply , the change of domestic aggregate supply , the change of the Rupiah / Dollar exchange rate , the average change of about foreign inflation , the change of dummy variables such as national events. The data was obtained from the Indonesian Central Bank and Central Bureau of Statistics. The research used multiple regression. The research showed that in the period January 1996 - June 1998 , Inflation in Indonesia was influenced by the change of money supply , the change of domestic aggregate supply and the change of the Rupiah / Dollar exchange rate . While, for the period of the monetary crisis July 1997 - June 1998 Inflation in Indonesia was just influenced by the change of money supply. This shows that during the monetary crisis the Indonesian government focused its attention on monetary policy rather than considering other economic factors , so during the monetary crisis, Inflation in Indonesia is a monetary phenomena.
